subtitle: One touch and suddenly healing is off the menu
Your very own glowing disco balls. Party mode: activated.
The magical equivalent of spitting. But, you know… deadlier.
A puff of wind, a leaf falls… hold your applause.
Your ranged fire tantrum, now in convenient spell form.
Force damage!
Because nothing says 'I believe in you' like a measly +1d4.
Helping you succeed… by the tiniest possible margin.
Flashy and mildly useful. Also, enemies now know exactly where you are.
Your magical floating hand is here to do chores. Yes, really.
Fixes broken stuff! Magic can’t fix your life though, sorry.
Your wineskin won’t leak anymore. Party saved.
Talking behind someone's back just got a magical upgrade.
Your fake chair won’t hold anyone! This gives me an idea...
Because when words fail, try a puff of toxic air.
Flavor your soup or summon confetti. Peak wizardry, really.
You made a tiny fireball! Try not to burn your eyebrows off.
Bright, flickery, and mildly destructive. Just like your party.
Cast & Chill. Watch enemies in slow motion.
Probably won't save you... But the effort counts, right?
Nothing says ‘divine wrath’ like glowing light and 1d8 pain.
Turn your humble stick into a d8-wielding nature-enhanced menace.
No reactions? Guess you’re too stunned by my charm... or the volts.
Stabilized. Not resurrected. Don’t get excited.
Stabilized! They’re not up and about yet, but hey, it’s progress.
Your target probably didn’t see this coming. Neither did anyone else.
Yes, I see the weak spot. It might be your ego.
Yes, I see the weak spot. Overcompensating with a big weapon, perhaps?
Ah, the subtle art of pointing like you know what you’re doing.
Your mother was a kobold and your father smelled of wet goblin.
I’ve met mimics with more personality.
Trust issues with your party? There’s a spell for that.
It’s less ‘Dr. Dolittle’ and more ‘Dr. Manipulate-a-Little’.
I cast self-esteem reduction!
As powerful as "Bless you!"
It's not manipulation, it's aggressive networking.
You solved the encounter with… glitter?
If it doesn't shine it doesn't count
"Sit"!
The scroll says 'Mind your own business.'
Goodbye, fog. You won’t be mist.
Turn dry places wet, wet places dry. Ultimate moist control.
You're patched up. Go ruin yourself again, hero.
You're better now. You won't do it again right? Right?
Good news: you sense the undead. Bad news: they sense lunch.
Wait! Magical doesn't mean safe! I warned you! ...
Usefull skill! Unless your friend is too quick and too curious...
This would've helped with that unidentified potion...
You appear slimmer. Reality, however, refuses to cooperate.
Radiant damage: because sometimes the gods need you to stop missing.
You prayed for strength. They gave you glow. Close enough.
Now your blade shines like your overconfidence.
Stop moving! You have to relax guys!
Running fast is a skill. Also an excellent life choice right now.
